article.description: Georgi Boyanov scored five of his 18 points in the last 15 seconds as South Alabama held off a late charge to beat Troy 66-58 on Tuesday night.
article.headline: South Alabama holds off Troy for 66-58 win
article.linkText: South Alabama holds off Troy for 66-58 win
article.story: TROY, Ala. -- Georgi Boyanov scored five of his 18 points in the last 15 seconds as South Alabama held off a late charge to beat Troy 66-58 on Tuesday night. Troy had a 31-25 halftime lead, but South Alabama used a 28-14 run to start the second half and led 53-45. Troy's Jeremy Hollimon, who finished with 14 points, nailed a 3-pointer to close to 53-51. Boyanov answered with two free throws and Ken Williams scored six straight points to give South Alabama a 61-56 lead. Troy's B.J. Miller had a layup to pull to 61-58 with 44 seconds left. Boyanov responded with a trey and followed with a dunk to seal it. Boyanov was 7 of 15 from the floor and grabbed 10 rebounds for the Jaguars (8-12, 3-6 Sun Belt Conference). Williams finished with 11 points and Shaq Calhoun added 10. Wesley Person had 15 points for Troy (6-14, 1-8).

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
